channel.description: Recent content in purpleteam on blog.olly.gg

item.title: Cyber Update 3rd Jan 2024
item.description: Did this work? *It seems so. So, here’s a couple of interesting articles and outcomes from today (4/1/24) Mandiant (Google) seem to have lost control of their Twitter/X - Not ideal CrowdStrike give an example of Defender scan logs being useful - Brief article here I will be providing an example in Splunk in the coming days on ingesting and triaging that data Excellent article by Purple Team, which is a new resource to me personally.
